prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: a beautiful young woman with ethereal beauty, in the style of impressionist oil painting, with soft, visible brushstrokes and rich, luminous interplay of light and shadow. full-body character design, standing centered on a pure white background. She has an exquisitely delicate and intelligent face with flawless, fair skin that seems to glow with an inner light. Her facial features are perfectly proportioned and refined: almond-shaped eyes, large and expressive, with a deep, thoughtful gaze that hints at极高 intelligence; when her unique ability is subtly active, her irises shimmer with faint, star-like silver specks. Her eyebrows are finely arched, her nose is straight and elegant, and her lips are full yet soft, often set in a gentle, contemplative expression that blends serene wisdom with underlying melancholy. Her hair is long, flowing like a silken waterfall, in a soft shade of pale lavender-silver, reminiscent of dawn mist and moonlight, with delicate strands framing her face. She wears a layered, flowing gown of sheer, gauzy fabrics in shades of pearlescent white and the faintest blush of pink, like the inner petals of a magnolia flower. The dress is ethereal and elegant, with sleeves that billow softly and a hem that seems to drift like mist, adorned with subtle, embroidered patterns resembling delicate flower veins and petals. The attire reflects the纯净, poetic aesthetic of the Algernon world. Her posture is graceful and poised, emanating极高 charm and quiet strength. The overall atmosphere is唯美 and优美细腻, capturing her connection to the阿尔吉侬花; faint, almost imperceptible floral motes of light seem to float near her fingertips. no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
